path.style: fill: none; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: #000000; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-opacity: 1;

rect.style: opacity: 1; fill: #000000; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;

opacity: 1; fill: #000000; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;

opacity: 1; fill: #000000; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-opacity: 1;

path.style: fill: #000000; fill-opacity: 1; stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-opacity: 1;
